title: Il Drago - Pizzeria Paninoteca Vegan Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Italian, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a large range of vegan options including pizzas, snacks, burgers, sandwiches, all sauces. Uses organic tempeh, tofu, seitan and sausages.
